featured.text: Here all the dogs are given a bath using professional shampoo and conditioners in a massaging tub.

definition.zh_def: 按摩，指用手或工具對身體進行的壓力和揉捏，以放鬆肌肉和改善血液循環。
definition.en_def: The act of applying pressure and kneading to the body, typically to relieve tension and improve circulation.
definition.example: She enjoys massaging her shoulders after a long day at work.
